properties.displayName: _CSGP: Sentinel Health: Domain Controller No Heartbeat
properties.description: Analytic rule to detect when a domain controller stops reporting a heartbeat from AMA.

alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: Sentinel Health: {{Computer}}: {{last_log_hr}} hours since last heartbeat
alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat:
Description: This analytic rule looks for events where a domain controller no longer has a heartbeat from MMA.

Handling guidance: Determine if the domain controller is still active. The log analytics agent may need to be reinstalled, or there may be a problem with the DC.
